name: Square² (actuallyKron)
description:
IMPORTANT: IF THE GAME ISN'T FOCUSED OR THE CONTROLS DON'T WORK. TRY HOVERING YOUR MOUSE OVER THE GAME AND USING THE SCROLL WHEEL. IF THIS DOESN'T WORK, TRY RELOADING THE PAGE. (weird bug or something idk)

This game was made for the Newbies Game Jam (2022 - 1)

How to Play
The game has a total of 20 levels. You complete each level by making it to the portal. Each level also has a Gold Square, that you can collect for bonus points! Some jumps are also pretty tricky. Have fun :)

Controls
Move - A D / Left Right / Left Joystick
Jump - Space / Up / Xbox Controller A
Respawn (if it bugs) - R / Xbox Controller  Y
Menu Navigation - W S / Up Down / Left Joystick

Credit
Made by: actuallyKron
Music by: Iirotvl
